[DQC.IFRS.0080.7879] ifrs-full:DividendsPaid has a value of -3,274,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:DividendsPaid fact are: Period :2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500GMPWNUM7HCZ452/2020-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/gaumont-2020-12-31AR.zip/gaumont-2020-12-31AR/reports/gaumont-2020-12-31AR.xhtml 11448

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [210000] Statement of financial position, current/non-current but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:OtherIntangibleAssets, gaumont:NoncurrentDeferredTaxAssets, ifrs-full:Goodwill, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxAssetsCurrent, ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssets, ifrs-full:CurrentAssets, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentAssets, ifrs-full:Inventories, ifrs-full:PropertyPlantAndEquipment, gaumont:FilmsAndAudiovisualRights, ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents, gaumont:TradeReceivablesAndContractAssets, ifrs-full:Assets All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -
